content: I think I'll start by creating a time series analysis to show the trend of new cases and deaths over time. I'll use a line chart with a logarithmic scale to better visualize the exponential growth. I'll also create a choropleth map to show the number of cases by country. Do you think I should use a specific Python library for this, such as Matplotlib or Seaborn, or should I use a more interactive library like Plotly or Bokeh?
